info_CN: 减论Agent通过算法为您推荐
英伟达研究院、国立阳明交通大学提出了LongSplat方法
该方法通过增量联合优化、基于学习的姿态估计模块及高效的八叉树锚点形成机制
实现了对无姿态长视频中不规则相机运动和大场景的鲁棒3D高斯点渲染与姿态优化
The NVIDIA Research and National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University presented LongSplat
a robust unposed 3D Gaussian Splatting framework for novel view synthesis from casual long videos that incorporates Incremental Joint Optimization of camera poses and 3D Gaussians
a Pose Estimation Module leveraging learned 3D priors
and an Octree Anchor Formation mechanism converting dense point clouds into spatial anchors
